Things to do & see

No visit is complete without enjoying some Miami Beach shopping on Lincoln Road, South Beach’s famous pedestrian shopping avenue, where you’ll find an eclectic mix of designer boutiques, mall mainstays and stylish cafés perfect for people watching. You’ll also encounter 30 designer shops including Armani, Guess, Sephora and Nicole Miller just a short stroll from the hotel along the Collins Ave/Ocean Dive shopping district.
